name.description: The comma separated names of the component templates

master_timeout.description: Timeout for waiting for new cluster state in case it is blocked

local.description: Return local information, do not retrieve the state from master node (default: false)

include_defaults.description: Return all default configurations for the component template (default: false)

flat_settings.description: Return settings in flat format (default: false)

settings_filter.description: Filter out results, for example to filter out sensitive information. Supports wildcards or full settings keys
